mainTitle: Unlock the freedom of live music!
subTitle: You're almost ready to get started with Songfoo. Please confirm your email, so we know it's really you.
aboutContent: Songfoo is a revolution in live music licensing.  For venues, it the added assurance of legal protection.  For artists is the freedom the opens the door to live music opportunities.
